\t\tTenant verification is a process that assures the landlords a thorough background check on the tenants before permitting them to reside. The main intention is to ensure they pay their rents on time, whether any criminal records or troublesome. In order to confirm a safety of the landlords, this process helps.
\n\t\tTenant verification is duly verified by the police. Tenantâ€™s identity has to be verified by the local authorities by sending the tenant\'s detail to the police station of the last known residence for clearance of any crime. It has been found that terrorists usually camouflage by staying as innocent boarders or paying guest. So it\'s highly advisable to submit the same to assure peace of mind and safety.

1) Download the Tenant Police 
 	 	 Verification Form.
 2) Fill the form with both tenant and 
 	 	 landlord details.
 3) Attach the latest photo of your tenant.
 4) Sign at the bottom of the form 
 	 	 confirming that that details mentioned 	 	 	 in the form are true and agree to it.
 5) Submit the filled form to the nearest 
 	 	 police station.
 6) Collect your acknowledgement receipt 	 	 	 and keep as a reference.


Best of luck

We help find, book rental homes of choice across 
Indian cities. We assisst with move-in, provide home maintainence services from cleaning, damages to rent payment and even move-out.
		 Whatever be your budget, whatever you may call a home (a bed, a room or an entire house), we have something for you!

SEND US THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION Via EMAIL 
 		1) Name 
 		2) Phone Number
 		3) Photo 
 		4) Fee 
 		5) Scanned Copy of your police 
 	 	 	 	 verification 
 		6) City
